scripts.build:assets: echo '[32mRunning build:assets...[0m' && pnpm run build:assets:bundle && pnpm run build:assets:static
scripts.build:assets:static: echo '[32mRunning build:assets:static...[0m' && pnpm run build:assets:static:css && pnpm run build:assets:static:scss && pnpm run build:assets:static:js
scripts.build:assets:static:css: echo '[32mRunning build:assets:static:css...[0m' && if [ "$(find client/static -name '*.css')" ]; then mkdir -p assets/static && for file in client/static/*.css; do cp "$file" "assets/static/$(basename $file)" && sass "$file" "assets/static/$(basename ${file%.css}.min.css)" --style compressed --no-source-map; done; fi;
scripts.build:assets:static:scss: echo '[32mRunning build:assets:static:scss...[0m' && if [ "$(find client/static -name '*.scss')" ]; then mkdir -p assets/static && for file in client/static/*.scss; do sass "$file" "assets/static/$(basename ${file%.scss}).css" --style expanded --no-source-map && sass "$file" "assets/static/$(basename ${file%.scss}).min.css" --style compressed --no-source-map; done; fi;
scripts.build:assets:static:js: echo '[32mRunning build:assets:static:js...[0m' && if [ "$(find client/static -name '*.js')" ]; then mkdir -p assets/static && for file in client/static/*.js; do cp "$file" "assets/static/$(basename $file)" && uglifyjs "$file" -o "assets/static/$(basename ${file%.js}.min.js)" --compress --mangle; done; fi;
scripts.build:i18n: echo '[32mRunning build:i18n...[0m' && pnpm run build:assets && composer run-script i18n-makepot && composer run-script i18n-updatepo && composer run-script i18n-makemo && composer run-script i18n-makejson
scripts.watch: echo '[32mRunning watch...[0m' && nodemon --watch client --ext css,scss,js --ignore '*.min.js' --ignore '*.min.css' --exec "pnpm run build:assets:bundle && pnpm run build:assets:static";
scripts.zip: echo '[32mRunning zip...[0m' && pnpm run build && composer install --no-dev && composer run-script zip && composer install
scripts.zip:release: echo '[32mRunning zip:release...[0m' && pnpm run readme:update && pnpm run version:check && pnpm run version:wp:check && pnpm run build && composer install --no-dev && composer run-script zip && composer install
